storyInfo: The eldest son of the Lord of Long Spring plots to usurp power by ordering the mercenaries and mutants to strike down the Lord. The Lord's guards are wiped out during the attack, and Rhodes Island joins with Team Rainbow to beat back the rebels.

attributes.content: Alexsandr, see if any of the mercs on the ground are alive!
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Tina, get your bandages. Take a headcount and patch up the wounded.
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Wait, please... lower your gun! I'll tell you anything!
attributes.name: Mercenary

attributes.text: The Infected boy lays on the ground, blood oozing out of his many wounds with each cough. His exposed skin is covered with fine Originium crystals, a direct result of facing down the Originium explosion at such close range.
No shockwaves, no intense gust of crushing wind. But the Originium curse has grown stronger from the stimulation, and penetrated deeper into his body.

attributes.content: Stay with me! Don't close your eyes, boy!
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: When you push yourself to use Originium Arts... it worsens your Originium infection...
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Rhodes Island doesn't have a countermeasure? Isn't this what you people do?
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: Between the blood loss, burns, and acute Oripathy symptoms, even if we were back on the landship...
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: I said stay with me, kid.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: ...You can do this. Remember how you wanted to travel the world? Picture that Columbia you were dreaming about.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: ...No... I had nothing to do with that. It wasn't me!
attributes.name: Mercenary

attributes.content: (Russian profanity), I'm going to twist your *profanity* head off.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: You're done for, (Russian profanity). You're toasted.
attributes.name: Tachanka

attributes.content: No! Don't hurt me! It wasn't me! No!
attributes.name: Mercenary

attributes.content: Where did that guard captain go? The Lord's daughter?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: She chased someone trying to get away. Rangers went with her, don't worry.
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: Wait... the crystals on the doctor's skin... are glowing?
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: We've got bigger problems! Find an empty room here!
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: We need cloth! Curtains, bedspreads, anything!
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Get the doctor into that little house! Hurry!
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: What's wrong with the doctor? Why...?
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: M-Miss Cohen, please calm down. Franka's dealing with the doctor's—
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: You've never seen it before? I'll explain it to you later—
attributes.name: Liskarm

attributes.content: Cover the doors and all the windows! No cracks!
attributes.name: Franka

attributes.content: The chimney! Block it! And the vents!
attributes.name: Schwarz

attributes.content: I'm not sure? What's wrong with... the doctor's corpse?
attributes.name: Blitz

attributes.content: Hey, is that room lighting up? The window's glowing?
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.content: What on earth is going on?
attributes.name: Ash

attributes.text: In the dark of the house, glittering dust crumbles from the departed's wounds and spreads throughout the enclosed space. Before long, rays of light pierce the darkness.
Brilliant, dazzling, prismatic light. Originium dust floats in the air among the lights, then slowly settles.
An Infected returns to the earth that birthed him.
